ValidationRule.description: Since sales360 user have edit rights to Programs, they are able to edit Program Name of BI Programs by default. This rule will prevent a sales360 user from editing a BI Program Name.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(Name))&& (OR( $Profile.Name = "Operations, Admins and Reps", $Profile.Name = "Sales Strategy", $Profile.Name = "Advocacy") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit the name of a Brand Investment Program.
